title: Auxiliary Good
description: AUXILIARY GOODs are items that are not part of any SECONDARY PACKED DRUG PRODUCT nor SECONDARY PACKED DEVICE, but complementary to them and as such shipped to customers. [source: 028-OCS-00283-RD01 (3.0) Product Stages, Global SKU Stages and Material Types; Chapter 3.13] AUXILIARY GOOD is an item that [a] is considered relevant to the Boehringer Ingelheim (BI) business, but is not part of the BI value chain, [b] is shipped internationally, generally with finished product, and [c] may have PRINT information, but that PRINT information is not managed via GLOBAL SKU in BI.

id.title: globalSku.globalSkuId
id.description: The Global SKU ID is the globally unique identifier for the GLOBAL SKU. It is a six digit integer.
